entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 except plus 4 near the water. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind light except west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light late this evening. Low plus 1 except plus 4 near the water. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023
